h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: A second part of this attack will trigger a ring of projectiles around his chakram to zoom toward you, which you'll need to also dodge shortly after the first blast.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
A second part of this attack will trigger a ring of projectiles around his chakram to zoom toward you, which you'll need to also dodge shortly after the first blast.
